thread.title: Royal Dutch Shell plc: Shell Files Annual Report and Form 20-F With SEC

author: cnbc.com
title: Royal Dutch Shell plc: Shell Files Annual Report and Form 20-F With SEC
text:
THE HAGUE, Netherlands, March 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
Royal Dutch Shell plc (NYSE: RDS.A) (NYSE: RDS.B) filed its Annual Report on Form 20-F for the year ended December 31, 2017, with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.
The 2017 Annual Report and Form 20-F can be downloaded from http://www.shell.com/annualreport or http://www.sec.gov .
Printed copies of the 2017 Annual Report and Form 20-F be available from April 19, 2018, and can be requested, free of charge, at http://www.shell.com/annualreport .
The Annual Report and Accounts will be submitted to the Annual General Meeting to be held on May 22, 2018.
